resources.string: What is this app about? Every year there is tons of traffic at Sac State. The goal of this app is to reduce traffic and show you alternative modes of transportation. This can help reduce traffic, carbon emissions. talk about facts that are bad about single occupant vehicles
This activity will display the data for the mode of transportation that the user selects
This Activity is where you can create a travel plan
This activity will allow the user to compare the different modes of transportation
I agree to terms and conditions

This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down This is where the terms and conditions will go. it may be long so the user can scroll down

Please enter in your home address above, we won\'t share that info with anyone. You may put a general location if you don\'t want to put your actual address but that will reduce the accuracy of our recommendations for you
image of whichever type this button will send user to
Here are the different ways you can get to school. Click on one to get more info about it
If you have not, compare the different plans first before so you can plan the best option for your commute
vehicle description, why you should use this vehicle, about 4-5 lines of text max

gas: 
insurance:
etc: 
per person: (if rideshare)
Average cost(min - max): avg cost
Electric cars are more environmentally friendly as it produces no carbon emissions. EV Charging Stations are available on campus.
Carpooling allows you to share the costs with a friend. CSUS offers carpooling permits and prime parking spaces.
~The toxic remains of its battery/plastics are placed into landfills.
~Estimated to save over 1.4 billion gallons of gas
~Estimated to decrease carbon dioxide emissions by 1.5 million tons each year
A convenient way to get around campus. Available for any student or employee with their OneCard present.
Jump Bikes are available all around Sac State\'s Campus!
“If you replace a car with a bike each time you go to work, you will save approximately 3000 pounds of greenhouse gas emissions each year.”
